123450.「アタシ 古代の釜に ふれるのが\n 三度のメシより 好きなんだけど\n なんと:
I love to touch ancient pots more than my third meal, and I'm wondering if I can make a living at it. I don't have the knowledge to
repair broken pots, but I'm good with my hands, so I was wondering if I could make use of that.

123451.「<%sL_PRISM>に\n フォルムチェンジするんだね？\n<yesno><:
You're going to change the form to
<%sL_PRISM>, right?
<yesno><close>

123452.「<%sL_PRISM>の\n <%sL_SLOT>の部分を\n <%sL_C_:
So you want to color the <%sL_SLOT> part of <%sL_PRISM> to <%sL_C_COLOR>? Then I need 10 <%sL_ITEM> and
<%dL_GOLD> gold, is that ok?

123453.「元の色に戻すで いいのかな？\n<yesno><break>:
Is it okay if I just restore the original
color?
<yesno><break>

123454.「それだと 今と変わらないよ？\n 他のものを チョイスしてね！\n<end>:
That's not gonna change anything, is it?
You'll have to choose something else!
<end>

123455.「他にも なんか用かな？\n<break>:
What else can I do for you?
<break>

123456.「この色では ないんだね。\n それなら 他の色を チョイスしてね。:
I see that this color is not for you. Then
choose another color.

123457.「こんにちはっ。釜デコ屋のヤシムだよ！\n さーて 今日は なんの用かな？\n<:
Hello, I'm Yashim from Pot Decor Shop! Well,
what can I do for you today?
<break>

123458.「了解っ！ じゃあ その色をつけるよ！: Got it! I'll put that color on then!

123459.「……やったー！\n ナイスなカラーに ペイントできたよー！\n<br>\n「他:
I did it! I painted it a nice color! Are there
any other areas you would like to color?

123460.「了解っ！ じゃあ 元の色に戻すよ！:
Got it! Okay, I'll change it back to its
original color!

123461.「……よし！ 元の色に戻ったよ！\n<br>\n「他にも カラーリングしたい部分:
...Okay! It's back to the original color! Are
there any other areas you'd like to color?

123462.「釜の フォルムは\n さくせんコマンドの いろいろ設定以下にある\n 『錬金釜:
You can also change the form of the pot in the "Alchemy Pot Settings" under Settings in the Misc. command. Come back and see me when you
get your new pot prism!

123463.錬金釜は\n<%sL_PRISM> のフォルムとなった！: Alchemy Pot became the form of <%sL_PRISM>!

123464.錬金釜のフォルムを\n元のフォルムに 戻した！:
The form of the Alchemy Pot was restored to
its original form!

123466.「さーて 今日は 何の用かな？\n<end>:
Well, what can I do for you today?
<end>

123467.「むぎゅ…… なんだか胸がドキドキしてきたよ。\n さては キミ 釜フォルムのニ:
Muggy... my heart is kind of pounding in my chest. So, you have a new mode of pot form, <%sL_PRISM>! If you attach it to your
pot, you can change the appearance of the pot to a new form! Of course, you can return to the original form at any time, and changing
the form will not affect the performance of the pot, so don't worry about that.
Would you like to install the <%sL_PRISM> on your pot right away?

123468.「むむむー 残念。\n また気が向いたら その時は よろしくね！:
Mmmm, too bad. If you feel like it again, I'll
be happy to meet you then!

123469.「いやっふうーー！\n それじゃ キミの釜を 新たな世界に ご招待！\n レッツ:
I'll be right back! I invite you to a new
world! Let's Prism newcomer!
<end>

123470.<%sL_PRISM>が 取り付けられて\n錬金釜のフォルムが ひとつ増えた！\:
<%sL_PRISM> was installed to add
one more form to Alchemy Pot!
<me_71><end>

123471.「ふー。これで キミの釜は 新しいフォルムに\n チェンジできるようになったよ。:
Whew. Now you can change your pot to a new
form. Well then, what else can I do for you?
<break>

123472.「こんにちはっ。ボク ヤシム。\n 錬金釜界の ファッションリーダーにして\n:
Hello, I'm Yashim, the fashion leader and top pot stylist of the Alchemy Pot world! My heart suddenly started pounding as soon as you approached. You have your own pot, don't you?
I can change the color and form of your pot.

123473.「あちゃ～ 素材が足りないみたいだね。: Acha~ Looks like you are lacking in materials.

123474.「あちゃ～ お金が足りないみたいだね。: Acha~ Looks like you don't have enough money.

123475.「悪いけど キミの釜は\n まだ 釜プリズムを 取り付けていないから\n フォル:
I'm sorry, but your pot doesn't have a pot prism yet, so you can't form change it. If you have received a pot prism somewhere, I will
install it perfectly in your pot, so please keep that in mind!

123476.「もし どこかで 釜プリズムっていう\n 貴重品を 手に入れたなら\n ボクのと:
If you have received a valuable item called a pot prism somewhere, please bring it to me. If you do, I'll make your pot even more
beautiful!

123477.「こんにちはっ。ボク ヤシム。\n 錬金釜界の ファッションリーダーにして\n:
Hello, I'm Yashim, the fashion leader and top pot stylist of the Alchemy Pot world! If you have your own pot, I'll let you enjoy the
dazzling world of pots by changing their color, shape and form.

123478.「それだと 今の色と変わらないよ？\n 他の色を チョイスしてね。:
That's the same color as the one you have now,
right? You'll have to choose another color.

123479.「なんについての 説明が聞きたいのかな？\n<select_se_off>\nカ:
What do you want to hear me explain?
<select_se_off>
About coloring
About Form Change
<select_end><break>

123480.「カラーリングは キミの釜を\n 様々な色に 変更できるサービスだよ！\n<br:
Coloring is a service that allows you to change the color of your pot to various colors! To restore the original color, there
is no charge.

123481.「フォルムチェンジは\n キミの釜の フォルムを 無料で\n 好きなものに 変更:
You can change the form of your pot for free! But please note that you need to have at least one prism attached to your pot to be able to
change the form.

123482.「ということで\n さーて 今日は なんの用かな？\n<break>:
So, what can I do for you today?
<break>
